meanings.definition: To convert into the metric system.
meanings.sent1: She metricates the recipe from cups to milliliters.
meanings.sent2: The scientist metricates the data for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The baker metricates the ingredients, making the kitchen a place of precision.
meanings.sent4: His mind metricates the world into neat, orderly units.
meanings.sent5: Metricating the map, she sees distances in a whole new light.

meanings.definition: To measure or evaluate using the metric system.
meanings.sent1: He metricates the length of the field in meters.
meanings.sent2: The teacher metricates the students' understanding of kilograms.
meanings.sent3: The cat metricates the height of the shelf, planning its next jump.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes metricate the room, taking in every detail.
meanings.sent5: Metricating the speed, he realizes how fast time flies.
